It Only Takes 5 Sessions

Extempraâ€™s classes consist of 5 scheduled workshops and one-on-one sessions to give you the forum you need to gain the conceptual knowledge and practice your skills.

Public Speaking Series

The Public Speaking Series is designed to help you build a proper foundation as speakers, practice in front of an audience, and finally, learn how to continue exploring the intricacies of writing and delivering a strong prepared or impromptu speech.

Session Topic Area Time Duration Description
1 Speech Craft 1.5 hours Participants will get a chance to learn the basic theories about writing a speech that properly guides the audience.
2 Delivery 2 hours This session challenges participants to integrate their body and their voice into a written speech.
3 Practice Session 1 1.5 hours Participants are asked to write a short minute speech to present to the group. Others will learn how to provide effective feedback.
4 Impromptu Speaking 2 hours The remainder of the participants complete their speech practice. A mini session on delivering impromptus is provided.
5 Personal Coaching 1 hour Participants recieve a one-on-one coaching session to provide more in-depth feedback about their strenghs/areas of growth.

Get notified when this class is offered next

Professional Speaking Series

The Professional Speaking Series is aimed at young professionals hoping to develop their personal brand and edge in a business setting. It will give you the tools to showcase an authentic, credible, and confident image from both a content and presentation perspective.

Get notified when this class is offered next

Accent Reduction Series

Our Accent Reduction Series is an effective method to develop your English conversational skills. It equips participants with the techniques required to incrementally reduce accents and speaking quirks both during and after the series. We recommend this for individuals new to Canada and the English language.

This series offers

  • A basic overview of English tonality and speech structures
  • Weekly conversation circles on intriguing topics
  • Facilitator led vocal and reading exercises
  • A detailed analysis of you speaking style and quirks
